Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds immense value and relevance to your needs, worth $10000 to you. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $9500. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure you receive the best possible value while also maximizing my earnings. I trust this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed, please let me know promptly. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
